summary: Provides a reusable mixin that encapsulates the setup and operation of pretrained backbone networks, handling their initialization from various libraries, exposing output channel dimensions and feature indices, and offering a streamlined forward pass with argument filtering.
business_intent: Enable developers to quickly incorporate and manage pretrained backbone models within larger deepâ€‘learning architectures for tasks such as image or text feature extraction, reducing boilerplate code and ensuring consistent handling of model outputs.
